HERO_SECTION_DESCRIPTION: Used to ensure the security and provenance of your assets.
ABOUT_US_SECTION_DESCRIPTION: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry.
CREATE_SECTION_DESCRIPTION1: For each product it is necessary to have an ERC-721 token collection, where the product will be represented by an amount of NFT that you choose.
CREATE_SECTION_ITEMS_DESCRIPTION1: We used an A.I to create 5 NFT images, generated from words provided in the field below. These images will represent different rarity levels,
CREATE_SECTION_ITEMS_DESCRIPTION2: read more about our A.I and rarities levels
FORM_ERROR_MUST_BE_GREATER: Field must be greater than {{maxNum}} characters
FORM_ERROR_MUST_BE_LESS: Field must be less than {{maxNum}} characters
REDEEM_SECTION_DESCRIPTION1: You can redeem tokens from companies that have provided a redemption code sold with the products.
